channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 02:03 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 02:03 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region. Watch for further messages.#Odessa_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
